modName: Glowing Red Draugr and Skeleton eyes
descriptionHtml:
Feel free to mix and match (example: green draugr eyes and red skeleton eyes).
For mixing, use the appropriate ____ only files.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38082//?]Green glowing eyes[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37830/?]Red glowing eyes[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38011//?]No glowing eyes[/url]

Installation (BSA Version):
Extract the plugin in the /Skyrim/Data folder and make sure this mod is checked on the load order; that's it!

Installation (Loose Files Version):
Extract the files /Skyrim/Data folder and overwrite anything if necessary.

Be sure to check out [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37718//?]The Draugr Retexture by Andre7890[/url] & [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32561/?]Bones and Skeletons Retexture by Andre7890[/url].
author: RJinthematrix
